title: DRAFT MOGS
body:
OK so this is a new custom gameode.

Rules are simple and as follows, it is a summoners rift, tt, or howling abyss draft mode game.

You may build boots at any stage of the game and full upgrade them.

you must build two warmogs then any item you wish followed by two more mogs.

 in order >>  (Warmogs) (warmogs) (any item of your choosing) (warmogs) (warmogs)


One jungler with smite per team max and they can start cinderhulk instead of their first warmogs.

potions are allowed and you may start dorans.

There is also one designated support per game who can complete a gp5s item in place of first mogs.

if you find your running out of mana then you should have picked a mana-less champ.



flasks are allowed

have fun.

replies.body:
So basically a normal game but you just gotta get full hp. Sion Veigar and Nasus would love this no Armour.

But I just gotta clarify something you build looks like this -- any boots {{item:3083}} {{item:3083}} (Any item) {{item:3083}} {{item:3083}}.
